title: GameChanger: IPS Program
description: Direct limited incentives to newcomers and complex tooling will not guarrantee a continuous multilingual onboarding into Cardano
solution: Let's seed monetized e-learning platforms with popularizers that can teach Cardano with a gamified wallet and keep earning organic income
experience: We made GameChanger, a highly humanized and gamified wallet, committed to newcomers, students and builders, made in an undeveloped country.
